snippet: The shooting death of an unarmed black man by a white police officer here on Tuesday has added new fuel to the already fiery debate over the role of race in the police use of lethal force.
abstract: Rumain Brisbon, unarmed black man, is shot and killed in Phoenix during police pursuit, adding new fuel to already fiery debate over role of race in police use of lethal force; incident prompts demonstrations.

byline.original: By REBEKAH ZEMANSKY and TAMAR LEWIN
byline.contributor: Rebekah Zemansky reported from Phoenix, and Tamar Lewin from New York.

lead_paragraph: The shooting death of an unarmed black man by a white police officer here on Tuesday has added new fuel to the already fiery debate over the role of race in the police use of lethal force.

headline.main: Police Shooting in Phoenix Fuels Protesters’ Outrage
headline.print_headline: Police Shooting in Phoenix Fuels Protesters’ Outrage

keywords.value: National Assn for the Advancement of Colored People
keywords.name: organizations
